channel.title: Pablo M. Canseco
channel.description: Recent content on Pablo M. Canseco

item.title: Easily Test Your Game Boy Emulator Implementation
item.description: TL;DR I have compiled a file of expected values for every register at each CPU cycle for the first 12,000 or so CPU cycles of the bootrom sequence in JSON format. You can download it here and use it to easily test your Game Boy emulator for correctness. [ { "a": 0, "b": 0, "c": 0, "d": 0, "e": 0, "f": 160, "h": 127, "l": 255, "pc": 12, "sp": 65534 }, { "a": 0, "b": 0, "c": 0, "d": 0, "e": 0, "f": 160, "h": 255, "l": 38, "pc": 15, "sp": 65534 }, // and so on.
